typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Company Name} as string,
		Equity as string,
		{Ticker Symbol} as string,
		E as string,
		S as string,
		G as string,
		ESG as string,
		EPS as string,
		{Profit Margin } as string,
		{Tobin's Q} as string,
		{Return on Asset} as string,
		{Return on Equity} as string,
		{Debt To Market Cap Ratio} as string,
		{Total Asset Turnover} as string,
		{Price to Sales Ratio} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Company Name} as string,
		Equity as string,
		{Ticker Symbol} as string,
		E as string,
		S as string,
		G as string,
		ESG as string,
		EPS as string,
		{Profit Margin } as string,
		{Tobin's Q} as string,
		{Return on Asset} as string,
		{Return on Equity} as string,
		{Debt To Market Cap Ratio} as string,
		{Total Asset Turnover} as string,
		{Price to Sales Ratio} as string
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
